mapper.select: SELECT li.id, li.grouping_name, li.grouping_describe, li.icon, lis.weight FROM b_label_grouping_info AS li LEFT JOIN ( SELECT label_grouping_id, sum(follow_number * 4 + article_number * 6) AS weight FROM b_label_info WHERE state = 0 AND label_grouping_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY label_grouping_id ) AS lis ON li.id = lis.label_grouping_id ORDER BY lis.weight DESC

SELECT lgi.grouping_name as name, count(ai.id) as data FROM b_label_grouping_info AS lgi LEFT JOIN b_article_information AS ai ON lgi.id = ai.grouping_id WHERE lgi.state = 0 GROUP BY lgi.grouping_name
